column2: title=From Peterborough to Faëry, The Poetics and Mechanics of Secondary Worlds

column1: '''''From Peterborough to Faëry, The Poetics and Mechanics of Secondary Worlds''''' is a collection of essays examining [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works. It was published as No. 31 in the ''[[Cormarë Series]]''.

column2: From Peterborough to Faëry The Poetics and Mechanics of Secondary Worlds From Peterborough to Faëry, The Poetics and Mechanics of Secondary Worlds was prepared in honour of Dr. Allan G. Turner's 65th Birthday and launched at the 2014 Tolkien Conference in Jena, Germany.}}

column1: * List of Publications by Allan Turner
* Geoffrey Chaucer's Mind Games: Household Management and Aesthetics in the Prologue to the Legend of Good Women
* Romantic World Building: J.R.R. Tolkien's Concept of Sub-creation and the Romantic Spirit
* Stories that Last: Storytelling in Terry Pratchett's The Amazing Maurice and His Educated Rodents
* Thursday Next, or: Metalepsis Galore – and More
* From Faëry to Madness: The Facts in the Case of Howard Phillips Lovecraft
* The Sub-creation of Sub-London: Neil Gaiman's and China Miéville's Urban Fantasy
